channel.title: Comments on: My Unscientific Case Study on Helpful Explanations
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Lee MacArthur
item.dc:creator: Lee MacArthur
item.description: It may not be fully scientific but the answers show you their thinking! To me that is what we as teachers are looking for because it often helps us see where they are coming from and if they've acquired a misconception.
item.content:encoded: It may not be fully scientific but the answers show you their thinking! To me that is what we as teachers are looking for because it often helps us see where they are coming from and if they’ve acquired a misconception.
